subtitle: Volume Z‑Score — unusual activity vs recent history.

measures.how_to_read: > 2.0 implies unusually high volume; < -2.0 unusually low.
measures.caveats: Earnings/news can dominate; combine with context.
measures.what_it_measures: Volume z-score — how unusual current volume is vs recent average.

assistant_hints: Focus on spikes with supporting price action, not isolated prints.
Debounce repeated alerts in choppy sessions.
Compare against session context (open/close) to avoid false positives.
Filter illiquid symbols where prints are unreliable.
